# Changelog

All notable changes to `laravel-log-dump` will be documented in this file

## 1.4.1 - 2022-01-19

- support Laravel 9

## 1.4.0 - 2020-11-26

- Support PHP 8.0

## 1.3.2 - 2020-09-09

- Support Laravel 8

## 1.3.1 - 2020-07-17

- fix spelling of `stopLoggingQueries` (#5)

## 1.3.0 - 2020-07-17

- add query logging

## 1.2.0 - 2020-06-18

- add `enable` and `disable`

## 1.1.0 - 2020-04-14

- add support for different log levels

## 1.0.0 - 2020-04-07

- initial release

## 0.0.1 - 2020-04-03

- experimental release
